Package com.topcoder.util.file.templatesource

Interface Summary
TemplateSource This interface abstracts a template source, some kind of repository where templates can be retrieved from, based on a given name.
 

Class Summary
FileTemplateSource Implementation of a template source that retrieves template from the file system.
 

Exception Summary
TemplateSourceException Exception thrown in the DocumentGenerator#getTemplate methods to indicate an error related to getting a template from a template source: there is no template source with a given id.
